suite.name: Task Searching
suite.description: Users can search for specific tasks by using the "Search" option, which is accessible from the side menu on all pages of the application, as well as from the quick access buttons on the Home Page. They need to provide a keyword, and the application will display all tasks whose title or description matches the keyword
